body_html: Could these people use the devel-gpu image instead? i.e., are they likely to require other packages provided by devel? The nightly-devel-gpu image is 4.87 GB, but maybe we can shrink it down more to make it acceptable.
body_text: Could these people use the devel-gpu image instead? i.e., are they likely to require other packages provided by devel? The nightly-devel-gpu image is 4.87 GB, but maybe we can shrink it down more to make it acceptable.
body: Could these people use the `devel-gpu` image instead? i.e., are they likely to require other packages provided by `devel`? The `nightly-devel-gpu` image is 4.87 GB, but maybe we can shrink it down more to make it acceptable.
